name: ReactJS
description: A free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces based on components.

name: ExpressJS
description: A minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides a robust set of features for web and mobile applications.

name: NodeJS
description: A cross-platform, open-source, back-end JavaScript runtime environment that executes JavaScript code outside a web browser.

name: Redux
description: A predictable state container for JavaScript apps, often used with React.

name: Firebase
description: A platform developed by Google for creating mobile and web applications.

name: Android
description: A mobile operating system based on a modified version of the Linux kernel and other open-source software, designed primarily for touchscreen mobile devices.

name: MaterialUI
description: A library that provides React components that implement Google's Material Design.

name: ChakraUI
description: A component library for React that provides simple, modular, and accessible UI components to build applications with speed.

name: TailwindCSS
description: A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom user interfaces.

name: Bootstrap
description: A popular open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development.

name: Sass
description: A preprocessor scripting language that is interpreted or compiled into Cascading Style Sheets (CSS).

name: HTML5
description: The latest version of Hypertext Markup Language, the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.

name: CSS3
description: The latest evolution of the Cascading Style Sheets language, used for describing the presentation of a document written in a markup language like HTML.

name: JavaScript
description: A programming language that conforms to the ECMAScript specification, and is a core technology of the World Wide Web, alongside HTML and CSS.

name: Java
description: A general-purpose, class-based, object-oriented programming language that is designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

name: Kotlin
description: A cross-platform, statically typed, general-purpose programming language with type inference. It is designed to interoperate fully with Java.

name: PHP
description: A popular general-purpose scripting language that is especially suited to web development.

name: Python
description: An interpreted, high-level and general-purpose programming language. It's widely used in web development, data science, and automation.

name: C++
description: A general-purpose programming language created as an extension of the C programming language, or 'C with Classes'.

name: MongoDB
description: A source-available cross-platform document-oriented database program.

name: MySQL
description: An open-source relational database management system.

name: PostgreSQL
description: A powerful, open-source object-relational database system.

name: AWS
description: A subsidiary of Amazon providing on-demand cloud computing platforms and APIs to individuals, companies, and governments, on a metered pay-as-you-go basis.

name: Heroku
description: A cloud platform as a service (PaaS) supporting several programming languages.

name: Netlify
description: A cloud computing company that offers a development platform that includes build, deploy, and serverless backend services for web applications and dynamic websites.

name: DigitalOcean
description: An American cloud infrastructure provider that provides developers cloud services that help to deploy and scale applications that run simultaneously on multiple computers.

name: jQuery
description: A fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library designed to simplify HTML DOM tree traversal and manipulation, as well as event handling, CSS animation, and Ajax.

name: Git VCS
description: A free and open-source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency.

name: GitHub
description: A provider of Internet hosting for software development and version control using Git.

name: WordPress
description: A free and open-source content management system written in PHP and paired with a MySQL or MariaDB database.
